short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes the political bias of articles AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This service hopes to make it easier for regular people to understand how news articles can be politically biased. It can be difficult to notice when things being said on the internet may or may not be influencing your political outlook. This service aims to help users take control of their internet browsing and become aware of the subtle or not so subtle biases on the web.
